contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|junket}} '''Junket''' may refer to: *[[Junket (dessert)]], a dessert made of flavoured, sweetened curds *[[Junket (company)]], a brand name of rennet tablets and dessert mixes *Junket, a name used in the UK for [[curd]]s made with rennet <!-- the following removed as it's a red link with no blue link; see MOS:DAB *[[Junket (trip)]], a junket is an organised gaming trip for gamblers who wish to travel outside their home country. Such trips can be arranged through junket clubs / promoters. --> {{disambig}}
